ReleaseNotes:
1. Add MCP Server for Wox plugin development (default enabled on port 29867, can be configured in settings)
 2. Add thousands separator for numbers in Calculator plugin `#4299`
 3.Add windows setting searches
 4.Add usage page in settings
    ![](screenshots/usage.png)

5.Improve

 6.Improve fuzzy match based on fzf algorithm
 7.Improve app searches on windows by

8.Fix

 9.[`AI Chat`] Fix a render issue
 10.[`Emoji`] Fix copy large image not working on windows
 11.[`Clipboard`] Fix clipboard image paste issue on windows
 12.Fix a theme regression released on beta.6 that causes crash on invalid theme colors `#4302`
